sentences.en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.
sentences.cn: 音乐学院让你有充分的理由任想象力自由驰骋。

sentences.en: a perfect performance
sentences.cn: 完美的演出

sentences.en: He had written the note from memory, word perfect, and spelled atrociously.
sentences.cn: 他凭着记忆作了记录，用词恰当但拼写错误百出。

sentences.en: He was not a paragon. He would never be perfect.
sentences.cn: 他不是完人，永远不可能十全十美。

sentences.en: He would never be improper, he is always the perfect gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他总是举止得体，一直是个完美的绅士。

sentences.en: Her house was in perfect order when she moved in.
sentences.cn: 她搬进来时，屋子里井井有条。

sentences.en: Hiring a nanny has turned out to be the perfect solution.
sentences.cn: 雇用保姆结果成了解决问题的最佳方法。

sentences.en: His English was perfect.
sentences.cn: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.en: I don't know him—he's a perfect stranger.
sentences.cn: 我不认识他,他是百分之百的陌生人。

sentences.en: In a perfect world, we wouldn’t need an army.
sentences.cn: 在理想世界中，我们不需要军队。

sentences.en: It would be idle to pretend the system is perfect.
sentences.cn: 假装系统完美无疵是徒劳的。

sentences.en: Mock trials help students perfect their legal skills.
sentences.cn: 模拟庭审有助于学生们完善自己的法律技能。

sentences.en: Nearby there is a stretch of white sand beach perfect for sunbathing.
sentences.cn: 附近有一片白色沙滩，是沐日光浴的绝佳场所。

sentences.en: She was a perfect fool.
sentences.cn: 她是个十足的傻瓜。

sentences.en: So this could be the perfect time to buy a home.
sentences.cn: 所以这可能是买房子的绝佳时机。

sentences.en: The car was in perfect condition.
sentences.cn: 这辆车的车况极佳。

sentences.en: The jumper strikes the perfect balance between comfort and smartness.
sentences.cn: 这件套头毛衣又舒服又漂亮。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: To err is human, and nobody likes a perfect person.
sentences.cn: 是人都会犯错，而且谁也不喜欢完人。

sentences.en: Tourists were scrambling over the rocks looking for the perfect camera angle.
sentences.cn: 游客们在正爬上岩石寻找最佳的拍摄角度。

sentences.en: What he had said to her made perfect sense.
sentences.cn: 他对她说的话非常合乎情理。

sentences.en: With its unique heating element it makes perfect coffee.
sentences.cn: 其独特的电热元件使它能够煮出非常美味的咖啡。

sentences.en: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.
sentences.cn: 你能拥有一口完美的牙齿太幸运了。

完全性；可改善性；可完美性
完美主义者，追求完美的人；至善论者

水乳交融；完美无谐波；十分和谐

trans.tran_cn: 完美的，十分适合的，完美无缺的，十足的，（动词）完成时的
trans.tran_en: not having any mistakes, faults, or damage
the form of a verb which is used when talking about a period of time up to and including the present. In English, it is formed with ‘have’ and the past participle.
